string-array.name: tutu_helper_questions
string-array.item: Why my app cannot use automatic reservation?
Why I cannot receive notification before reservation start?
What should I do with unknown error?
Who should I be grateful to?

string-array.name: tutu_helper_answers
string-array.item: Tap the top area of the left navigation bar, and input your student Id, password. All reservation functions will be activated then.
Tutu will help you to search the most suitable reading room for you. And recommendations should be display when no available room for you.

As long as you present the required reservation slots, Tutu will regularly check whether there are suitable rooms for you. Due to the limited resources between reading rooms, we only allowed 2 automatic reservation in advance.
Maybe app is killed by your android system or other apps, please make sure that tsinghua tutu is running at backend.
Maybe app is killed by your android system or other apps, please make sure that tsinghua tutu is running at backend.
Click the floating action balls, you can filter reservation by time periods and minimal interval.
You can tell me the bugs in feedback activity, best to attach screenshots.
